nodes.text: Messo was a male Trandoshan who served as an aide to the Republic Senator and a spy for the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

After he failed to deliver a datachip with key Republic strategies to Asajj Ventress because of the intervention of clone troopers led by Jedi General Ki-Adi-Mundi, he traveled to the planet of Mon Gazza, where he delivered the chip to another CIS agent, San Maxus. Shortly afterward, he was tracked by Anakin Skywalker, and he fell from a ledge and was hit by an oncoming Podracer, which killed him instantly.
